articles.original_article_title: Les Los Angeles Dodgers refusent l’entrée de leur parking à la police fédérale de l’immigration
articles.simplified_french_title: Les Dodgers refusent l'accès à la police de l'immigration
articles.simplified_english_title: Dodgers deny entry to immigration police
articles.french_summary: Le club de baseball des Los Angeles Dodgers a refusé que la police fédérale de l'immigration entre dans son parking. C'est le résultat d'une nouvelle politique.
articles.english_summary: The Los Angeles Dodgers baseball team denied federal immigration police access to their parking lot. This is due to a new policy.

Los Angeles Dodgers.display_format: **Los Angeles Dodgers:** Équipe de baseball américaine
Los Angeles Dodgers.explanation: Major League Baseball team based in Los Angeles

refusent.explanation: They refuse, they deny (third person plural present tense of 'refuser')

de.explanation: Of, from (preposition indicating origin or association)

leur.explanation: Their (possessive adjective, singular form for plural possessors)

parking.explanation: Parking lot, car park (masculine noun, common anglicism in French)

à.explanation: To, at (preposition indicating destination or attribution)

fédérale.explanation: Federal (feminine adjective, referring to a federal government)

l’immigration.explanation: Immigration (feminine noun, referring to the movement of people into a country)
